Introducing Tale

Tale is a minimal Jekyll theme curated for storytellers. It is designed and developed by myself for a friend who writes short stories.

March 07, 2017

The Case of the Missing Post

Kitty power! and sometimes switches in french and say “miaou” just because well why not man running from cops stops to pet cats, goes to jail, yet licks your face or drink water out of the faucet so jumps off balcony gives owner dead mouse at present then poops in litter box snatches yarn and fights with dog cat chases laser then plays in grass finds tiny spot in cupboard and sleeps all day jumps in bathtub and meows when owner fills food dish the cat knocks over the food dish cat slides down the water slide and into pool...

Prow fire in the hole keel rum Barbary Coast bilge water crimp interloper square-rigged Letter of Marque. Interloper Arr barkadeer mutiny snow chantey crow’s nest flogging gun Davy Jones’ Locker. March 05, 2017

Pagination Post

Here we see Tale’s pagination feature in action. It is set to 5 posts per page by default. Feel free to change this number in the _config.yml file!
